languages.text: "Я был мореходом. Каждую весну мы выходили в Мировое море и били многоруких кракенов и алчных морских дрейков. А затем приходил Сезон огня, и мы высаживались на Асахейм, чтобы в битве отстоять право клана на стоянку на тверди. Я был юн, но уже грозен, когда враг сразил меня, а я — его. Убийцу моего звали Арнульф. Избирающий доблестных, что взирал на брань со скал, избрал нас обоих достойными и забрал в Клык для исцеления. Мой клан был горд!"

"I was a seafarer. Every spring we would go out onto the Worldsea and slay many-armed krakens and ravenous sea drakes. And then the Season of Fire would come, and we would dock on Asaheim to battle for our clan's right to inhabit that land. I was young but already fierce and facing down foes twice my size. The Chooser of the Valiant, who had watched the fateful battle from the cliffs, deemed me worthy and took me to the Fang for healing. My clan was proud!"
languages.original_text: "Я был мореходом. Каждую весну мы выходили в Мировое море и били многоруких кракенов и алчных морских дрейков. А затем приходил Сезон огня, и мы высаживались на Асахейм, чтобы в битве отстоять право клана на стоянку на тверди. Я был юн, но уже грозен, когда враг сразил меня, а я — его. Убийцу моего звали Арнульф. Избирающий доблестных, что взирал на брань со скал, избрал нас обоих достойными и забрал в Клык для исцеления. Мой клан был горд!"

traits.locale_text: "I was a seafarer. Every spring we would go out onto the Worldsea and slay many-armed krakens and ravenous sea drakes. And then the Season of Fire would come, and we would dock on Asaheim to win in battle our clan's right to inhabit that land. I was young, but already fierce, when a foe cut me down, and I did the same to him. Arnoolf was my killer's name. The Chooser of the Valiant, who had watched the battle from the cliffs, deemed us both worthy and took us to the Fang for healing. My clan was proud!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I was a seafarer. Every spring we would go out onto the Worldsea and slay many-armed krakens and ravenous sea drakes. And then the Season of Fire would come, and we would dock on Asaheim to win in battle our clan's right to inhabit that land. I was young, but already fierce, when a foe cut me down, and I did the same to him. Arnoolf was my killer's name. The Chooser of the Valiant, who had watched the battle from the cliffs, deemed us both worthy and took us to the Fang for healing. My clan was proud!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I was a seafarer. Every spring we would go out onto the Worldsea and slay many-armed krakens and ravenous sea drakes. And then the Season of Fire would come, and we would dock on Asaheim to win in battle our clan's right to inhabit that land. I was young, but already fierce, when a foe cut me down, and I did the same to him. Arnoolf was my killer's name. The Chooser of the Valiant, who had watched the battle from the cliffs, deemed us both worthy and took us to the Fang for healing. My clan was proud!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I was a seafarer. Every spring we would go out onto the Worldsea and slay many-armed krakens and ravenous sea drakes. And then the Season of Fire would come, and we would dock on Asaheim to battle for our clan's right to inhabit that land. I was young but already fierce and facing down foes twice my size. The Chooser of the Valiant, who had watched the fateful battle from the cliffs, deemed me worthy and took me to the Fang for healing. My clan was proud!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “我原本只是个海员。每年春天，我们都会启航去世界之海，猎杀强悍的海怪与贪婪的深海幼龙。在那之后，火季便会到来，而我们的船会停靠在阿萨海姆，与其他氏族开战，赢得土地的居住权。那个时候我还年轻，但我作战勇猛，就算面对比我高大两倍的敌人也从不退缩。那个时候，甄勇者在悬崖上观看了我们的战斗，他认为我很有潜质，于是把我送到了狼牙圣殿进行治疗。我的氏族为此非常自豪！”
languages.original_text: "I was a seafarer. Every spring we would go out onto the Worldsea and slay many-armed krakens and ravenous sea drakes. And then the Season of Fire would come, and we would dock on Asaheim to battle for our clan's right to inhabit that land. I was young but already fierce and facing down foes twice my size. The Chooser of the Valiant, who had watched the fateful battle from the cliffs, deemed me worthy and took me to the Fang for healing. My clan was proud!"

traits.locale_text: “我原本只是个海员。每年春天，我们都会启航去世界之海，猎杀强悍的海怪与贪婪的深海幼龙。在那之后，火季便会到来，而我们的船会停靠在阿萨海姆，与其他氏族开战，赢得土地的居住权。那个时候我还年轻，但我作战勇猛。敌人把我砍倒在地，但我也同样砍倒了他。那个砍倒我的人叫阿努尔夫。那个时候，甄勇者在悬崖上观看了这场战斗，他认为我们两个都很有潜质，于是把我们都送到了狼牙圣殿进行治疗。我的氏族为此非常自豪！”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «Era marinero. Cada primavera zarpábamos por el Mar del Mundo para matar a los krakens con sus muchos tentáculos y a los dragones de mar hambrientos. Después, cuando llegaba la Estación de Fuego, atracábamos en Asaheim para luchar por el derecho de nuestro clan a habitar esa tierra. Era joven pero fiero y luchaba contra enemigos el doble de grandes. El Elector de los Valientes, que observaba la fatídica batalla desde los acantilados, me consideró digno y me llevó al Colmillo para curarme. ¡Mi clan estuvo muy orgulloso!».
languages.original_text: "I was a seafarer. Every spring we would go out onto the Worldsea and slay many-armed krakens and ravenous sea drakes. And then the Season of Fire would come, and we would dock on Asaheim to battle for our clan's right to inhabit that land. I was young but already fierce and facing down foes twice my size. The Chooser of the Valiant, who had watched the fateful battle from the cliffs, deemed me worthy and took me to the Fang for healing. My clan was proud!"

traits.locale_text: «Era marinero. Cada primavera zarpábamos por el Mar del Mundo para matar a los krakens con sus muchos tentáculos y a los dragones de mar hambrientos. Después, cuando llegaba la Estación de Fuego, atracábamos en Asaheim para ganar el derecho de nuestro clan a habitar esa tierra en combate. Era joven pero fiero cuando un enemigo me abatió a la vez que yo acababa con su vida. El que me mató se llamaba Arnoolf. El Elector de los Valientes, que observaba la batalla desde los acantilados, nos consideró dignos a los dos y nos llevó al Colmillo para curarnos. ¡Mi clan estuvo muy orgulloso!».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「俺は船乗りだった。毎年春になると、俺達は大海に出て、腕が何本もあるクラーケンや腹を空かしたシードレイクを倒していた。そして炎の季節がやってくると、俺たちはアサへイムに停泊して、一族がその地に住む権利を勝ち取るための戦いに挑んだ。俺はまだ若かったが、すでに勇猛果敢で、体の大きさが2倍ある敵を倒したもんだ。崖の上からこの運命の戦いを見ていた勇者の選者が俺の価値を認めて、牙城に連れて行かれて治療してくれたのさ。俺の一族は誇りに思ってくれたよ！」
languages.original_text: "I was a seafarer. Every spring we would go out onto the Worldsea and slay many-armed krakens and ravenous sea drakes. And then the Season of Fire would come, and we would dock on Asaheim to battle for our clan's right to inhabit that land. I was young but already fierce and facing down foes twice my size. The Chooser of the Valiant, who had watched the fateful battle from the cliffs, deemed me worthy and took me to the Fang for healing. My clan was proud!"

traits.locale_text: 「俺は船乗りだった。毎年春になると、俺たちは大海に出て、数多の腕を備えたクラーケンや貪欲なシードレイクを倒していた。そして炎の季節がやってくると、俺たちはアサへイムに停泊し、一族がその土地に住む権利を勝ち取るための戦いに挑んだ。俺はまだ若かったが、すでに獰猛だった。敵が俺を切り倒せば、俺は同じことをその相手に見舞った。アーノルフは俺を殺した者の名だ。その戦いを崖の上から見ていた勇者の選者は、俺たち二人を価値ある者とみなし、治療のために<牙城>に連れて行った。俺の一族は誇らしかろう！」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Ich war Seefahrer. Jeden Frühling zogen wir hinaus auf die Weltsee und töteten vielarmige Kraken und hungrige Seedrachen. Und dann kam die Zeit des Feuers und wir legten in Asaheim an, um im Kampf für unseren Clan das Recht zu erringen, dieses Land zu bewohnen. Ich war jung, doch schon stark, und streckte Gegner nieder, die doppelt so groß waren wie ich. Der Erwähler der Tapferen, der den Kampf von den Klippen aus beobachtet hatte, erkannte mich als würdig an. Er brachte mich zum Reißzahn, wo wir geheilt wurden. Mein Clan war stolz!"
languages.original_text: "I was a seafarer. Every spring we would go out onto the Worldsea and slay many-armed krakens and ravenous sea drakes. And then the Season of Fire would come, and we would dock on Asaheim to battle for our clan's right to inhabit that land. I was young but already fierce and facing down foes twice my size. The Chooser of the Valiant, who had watched the fateful battle from the cliffs, deemed me worthy and took me to the Fang for healing. My clan was proud!"

traits.locale_text: "Ich war Seefahrer. Jeden Frühling zogen wir hinaus auf die Weltsee und töteten vielarmige Kraken und hungrige Seedrachen. Und dann kam die Zeit des Feuers und wir legten in Asaheim an, um im Kampf für unseren Clan das Recht zu erringen, dieses Land zu bewohnen. Ich war jung, doch schon stark, als ein Feind mich niederstreckte und ich auch ihn. Arnoolf hieß mein Mörder. Der Erwähler der Tapferen, der den Kampf von den Klippen aus beobachtet hatte, erkannte uns beide als würdig an. Er brachte uns zum Reißzahn, wo wir geheilt wurden. Mein Clan war stolz!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « J'étais un marin. Chaque printemps, nous voguions sur la Mer-Monde pour terrasser nombre de krakens tentaculaires et de dracs voraces. Puis la saison du feu arrivait et nous accostions à Asaheim pour que notre clan gagne le droit d'habiter cette terre. J'étais jeune, mais déjà féroce et capable d'en remontrer à des adversaires deux fois plus grands que moi. Le Sélecteur des Vaillants, qui observait la bataille fatidique depuis les falaises, m'a jugé digne et emmené au Croc pour me soigner. Mon clan était fier ! »
languages.original_text: "I was a seafarer. Every spring we would go out onto the Worldsea and slay many-armed krakens and ravenous sea drakes. And then the Season of Fire would come, and we would dock on Asaheim to battle for our clan's right to inhabit that land. I was young but already fierce and facing down foes twice my size. The Chooser of the Valiant, who had watched the fateful battle from the cliffs, deemed me worthy and took me to the Fang for healing. My clan was proud!"

traits.locale_text: « J'étais un marin. Chaque printemps, nous voguions sur la Mer-Monde pour terrasser bon nombre de krakens tentaculaires et de dracs voraces. Puis la saison du feu arrivait et nous accostions à Asaheim pour que notre clan gagne le droit d'habiter cette terre. J'étais jeune, mais déjà féroce : quand un ennemi m'a blessé, je le lui ai bien rendu. Celui qui cherchait à me tuer s'appelait Arnoolf. Le Sélecteur des Vaillants, qui observait la bataille depuis les falaises, nous a jugés tous deux dignes et nous a emmenés au Croc pour nous soigner. Mon clan était fier ! »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.original_text: "I was a seafarer. Every spring we would go out onto the Worldsea and slay many-armed krakens and ravenous sea drakes. And then the Season of Fire would come, and we would dock on Asaheim to battle for our clan's right to inhabit that land. I was young but already fierce and facing down foes twice my size. The Chooser of the Valiant, who had watched the fateful battle from the cliffs, deemed me worthy and took me to the Fang for healing. My clan was proud!"

languages.text: "Eskiden gemiciydim. Her bahar Dünyadeniz'e açılıp çok kollu krakenleri ve vahşi deniz karabataklarını avlardık. Ateş Mevsimi geldiğinde, klanımızın hakkı olan toprakları ele geçirmek için Asaheim'de demirleyip savaşırdık. Çok gençtim ama o zamanlar bile oldukça vahşiydim, iki katım kadar olan düşmanları alt ederdim. Vahim savaşımızı kayalıklardan izleyen Yiğitlerin Seçicisi beni layık gördü ve iyileşmem için Diş'e götürdü. Klanım benimle gurur duymuştu!"
languages.original_text: "I was a seafarer. Every spring we would go out onto the Worldsea and slay many-armed krakens and ravenous sea drakes. And then the Season of Fire would come, and we would dock on Asaheim to battle for our clan's right to inhabit that land. I was young but already fierce and facing down foes twice my size. The Chooser of the Valiant, who had watched the fateful battle from the cliffs, deemed me worthy and took me to the Fang for healing. My clan was proud!"

traits.locale_text: "O zamanlar gemiciydim. Her baharda Dünyadeniz'e açılıp çok kollu krakenleri ve vahşi deniz karabataklarını avlardık. Ateş Mevsimi geldiğinde, klanımızın hakkı olan topraklarını ele geçirmek için Asaheim'de demirleyip savaşırdık. Çok gençtim ama o zamanlar bile oldukça vahşiydim, iki katım kadar düşmanları alt ederdim. Vahim savaşımızı kayalıklardan izleyen Yiğitlerin Seçicisi beni layık gördü ve iyileşmem için beni Diş'e götürdü. Klanım benimle gurur duymuştu!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
